nodes.text: The Falling Leaf, or Falling Avalanche, was a lightsaber combat technique that involved spinning on one's feet to "slash from the sky". It was used by the Jedi Knights of the Army of Light around 1000 BBY.
Kyle Katarn was taught this technique by the spirit of Tal on Ruusan in 5 ABY. Kyle used it to kill Jerec after the latter tried to kill him despite being offered a chance to live.
